name: Proto Tower 13
description: This is the third of the proto towers created on the road. Used Microsoft Paint and a mouse to draw, so a bit different look. Also, the resize feature on Microsoft Paint does not maintain sharp pixel borders, so I had to write a python script to increase the size of the 64x64 grid. See code snippit below, I forgot about that trait_type on proto tower 11 and 12.

attributes.value:
from PIL import Image


def resize_image(input_path, output_path, new_width, new_height):

    with Image.open(input_path) as img:

        print(f"Original dimensions: {img.size}")


        resized_img = img.resize((new_width, new_height), Image.NEAREST)


        resized_img.save(output_path)


        print(f"New dimensions: {resized_img.size}")
